mapper.insert: insert into checkon (begintime, endtime, beginstate, endstate, today, month,employeeid) values (#{beginTime},#{endTime},#{beginState},#{endState},#{today},#{month},#{employeeId});
mapper.update: update checkon set begintime = #{beginTime},endTime=#{endTime},beginState=#{beginState},endState=#{endState},today=#{today},month=#{month},employeeId=#{employeeId} where id=#{id};
